name: Time Circuit
storyline: In this world governed by time, you are the commander of the "Momentarians," a group of particle creatures created and sustained by time. Time is the most important resource in this universe. You can use time to accelerate production, engage in commodity trading, or unleash powerful skills, among other things. At the same time, you need to constantly monitor the remaining time because when the countdown ends, your clan will be wiped out.
summary: Deep integration of city builder and tower defense. Time is the most crucial resource in this world. Lead your clan to construct a base in the dazzling circuit world and fend off waves of enemy attacks!
